CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(FirstLevelComplaintClassification__c ,"Reclamo Scritto"), IF(ISPICKVAL(Status ,"Chiuso"), IF( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) <= CompletedDocumentationDate__c && DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) > EndDate__c, AmountToPayInInstallments__c,IF( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) <= DepositExpirationDate__c && DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) > CompletedDocumentationDate__c, AmountToPayInInstallments__c*2,IF( DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) > DepositExpirationDate__c, AmountToPayInInstallments__c*3, 0))), IF(TODAY() <= CompletedDocumentationDate__c && TODAY() > EndDate__c, AmountToPayInInstallments__c,IF(TODAY() <= (DepositExpirationDate__c) && TODAY() > (CompletedDocumentationDate__c), AmountToPayInInstallments__c*2,IF(TODAY() > (DepositExpirationDate__c), AmountToPayInInstallments__c*3, 0))) ), null)
CustomField.label: Indennizzo per invio risposta
